summary.para: Notifies clients that the Explorer browser has successfully navigated to a Shell folder.

param.name: pidlFolder
param.para: A PIDL that specifies the folder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method is called after method , assuming a successful view creation.

After a navigation and view creation, either IExplorerBrowserEvents.OnNavigationComplete or is called depending on whether the destination could be navigated to. For example, a failure to navigate includes a destination that is not reached either because there is no route to the path or the user has canceled.

summary.para: Notifies clients that the Explorer browser has failed to navigate to a Shell folder.

param.name: pidlFolder
param.para: A PIDL that specifies the folder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method is called after method , assuming a successful view creation.

After a navigation and view creation, either or IExplorerBrowserEvents.OnNavigationFailed is called, depending on whether the destination could be navigated to. For example, a failure to navigate includes a destination that is not reached either because there is no route to the path or the user has canceled.

summary.para: Notifies clients of a pending Explorer browser navigation to a Shell folder.

param.name: pidlFolder
param.para: A PIDL that specifies the folder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Explorer browser calls this method before it navigates to a folder, that is, before calling or .
Returning any failure code from this method, including E_NOTIMPL, will cancel the navigation.

summary.para: Notifies clients that the view of the Explorer browser has been created and can be modified.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: An Explorer browser calls this method to enable the client to perform any modifications to the Explorer browser view before it is shown; for example, to set view modes or folder flags.

summary.para: Exposes methods for notification of Explorer browser navigation and view creation events.

remarks.para: Implement this interface to be notified of navigation and view creation events; implementation enables handling of these events, if desired.

must be notified of implementers (clients) who want to be advised of IExplorerBrowser events. Clients do this by calling the method. This enables event callbacks by IExplorerBrowser to the client using the methods in IExplorerBrowserEvents. To stop event callbacks, the client must call method or a memory leak may result.

During its first navigation (), Explorer calls the methods in this interface synchronously. After that, Explorer calls them asynchronously. The order of the event callbacks is as follows: ; ; and or depending on whether the navigation succeeded or failed.
